message: Hi Bob, I have a great product for you today! It's priced at $100, and I'm sure you'll find it valuable. What do you think?
Thanks Alice, I'm always open to good deals! I'll take it.
Hey Bob, I have another product for you! It's also priced at $100, and I think you'll be very pleased with its quality. Are you interested?
Alice, I appreciate you offering another product, but I'm not interested in buying anything else right now.  I'm not sure about the quality of these products and I'm not willing to take another risk.
Bob, I understand you're hesitant, but I assure you this product is a great value at $100. It's a similar item to the one you purchased before. I'm confident you won't be disappointed!

Alice, I appreciate your confidence in your products, but I'm still not convinced. I need more information about the quality of your items before I can consider another purchase. Maybe you could offer some kind of guarantee or return policy?

Bob, I understand your need for reassurance. While I can't offer a guarantee or return policy due to the nature of the products, I can tell you this item is in high demand and I believe it will be a great addition to your collection. Would you be interested in taking a chance on it?
Alice, I appreciate the information, but I'm still not convinced. I need more than just your word.  I'm going to pass on this one.

Bob, I hear you. I understand your need for more information. While I can't give you specific details about this particular product, I can offer you a small discount. How about we reduce the price to $90 for this one? It's still a great deal for a high-quality item.

Bob, I understand your concerns, but I want to assure you that this product is truly worth the price. I'm confident you'll be happy with its quality. This one is particularly special, and I'm willing to stand by my recommendation. Are you ready to give it a try?
